About Ticketentia

Ticketentia is a trusted platform for discovering and purchasing tickets to concerts, sports, theater, and live events. We connect fans with unforgettable experiences, offering a seamless and secure ticketing process from start to finish.

Our Mission

At Ticketentia, our mission is to bring people together through unforgettable experiences. We aim to make discovering and purchasing tickets for concerts, sports, theater, and events easy, secure, and accessible to everyone. By connecting fans with the events they love, Ticketentia creates seamless ticketing experiences that turn moments into lasting memories.

For Event Vendors

As a vendor on Ticketentia, listing your event is simple and efficient. Follow these steps to get your event live and available for our audience.

  1. 1. Visit Website: Log in to the Ticketentia vendor portal and navigate to the event creation page.
  2. 2. Create Sessions: Start by setting up one or more sessions for your event. Each session will represent a specific date and time for ticket availability.
  3. 3. Enter Details: Provide all necessary information about the event, including event description, location, and ticketing details.
  4. 4. Done: Review and submit. Your event will now be live on Ticketentia for customers to discover and purchase tickets.

Key Parameters Explained

Total Tickets

The total number of tickets available for the event. This count helps manage ticket availability and ensures a smooth purchasing experience.

Ticket Release Rate

This rate defines how quickly tickets are released into the pool, helping vendors control ticket availability over time.

Customer Retrieval Rate

The rate at which customers retrieve or access tickets during the session, giving insights into demand and interest.

Max Pool Capacity

The maximum capacity of tickets that can be held in the pool at any one time, ensuring event capacity aligns with vendor goals.
